Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.AutoEscapingPolicy

  • Packages that use AutoEscapingPolicy 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)

    • Uses of AutoEscapingPolicy in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that return AutoEscapingPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AutoEscapingPolicy Configuration.getAutoEscapingPolicy()
      When auto-escaping should be enabled depending on the current output format; default is ENABLE_IF_DEFAULT.
      AutoEscapingPolicy MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration.getAutoEscapingPolicy()
      The getter pair of MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration.setAutoEscapingPolicy(AutoEscapingPolicy).
      AutoEscapingPolicy ParsingConfiguration.getAutoEscapingPolicy()
      See Configuration.getAutoEscapingPolicy().
      AutoEscapingPolicy Template.getAutoEscapingPolicy()
      Returns the Configuration.getAutoEscapingPolicy() autoEscapingPolicy) that this template uses.
      AutoEscapingPolicy TemplateConfiguration.getAutoEscapingPolicy() 
      protected AutoEscapingPolicy Configuration.ExtendableBuilder.getDefaultAutoEscapingPolicy() 
      protected abstract AutoEscapingPolicy MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration.getDefaultAutoEscapingPolicy()
      Returns the value the getter method returns when the setting is not set, possibly by inheriting the setting value from another ParsingConfiguration, or throws CoreSettingValueNotSetException.
      protected AutoEscapingPolicy TemplateConfiguration.Builder.getDefaultAutoEscapingPolicy() 
      static AutoEscapingPolicy AutoEscapingPolicy.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static AutoEscapingPolicy[] AutoEscapingPolicy.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
